<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_scriptlet"><sys_ux_data_broker_scriptlet action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><api_name>x_snc_uib_examples.getSystemProperty_Scriptlet</api_name><description>Returns the system property</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>getSystemProperty_Scriptlet</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
{
"name":"propertyname",
"label":"Property Name",
"description":"Name of the system property",
"readOnly":"false",
"fieldType":"string",
"mandatory":true,
"defaultValue":""
}
]</props><required_translations>[ {
  "message" : "Name of the system property",
  "comment" : ""
}, {
  "message" : "Property Name",
  "comment" : ""
} ]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
var record = gs.getProperty(input.propertyname);
var obj = JSON.parse(record);
return obj;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_scriptlet</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Marc.Mouries</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-05-27 00:20:01</sys_created_on><sys_id>33fff3c81b33c910b00dddf6b04bcb48</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getSystemProperty_Scriptlet</sys_name><sys_package display_value="UIB Examples" source="x_snc_uib_examples">a0a606201b0f8510ce2b6579b04bcb65</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="UIB Examples">a0a606201b0f8510ce2b6579b04bcb65</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_scriptlet_33fff3c81b33c910b00dddf6b04bcb48</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Marc.Mouries</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-27 00:43:17</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_scriptlet><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=33fff3c81b33c910b00dddf6b04bcb48"/></record_update>
